question.spanish: ¿Por qué quiere venir a Costa Rica?
question.english: Why do you want to come to Costa Rica?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Quiero venir a Costa Rica porque es un país pacífico, sin ejército, con excelente calidad de vida y gran respeto por la naturaleza. Me interesa trabajar en el sector de turismo sostenible y tecnología.
sampleAnswer.english: I want to come to Costa Rica because it is a peaceful country, without an army, with excellent quality of life and great respect for nature. I am interested in working in the sustainable tourism and technology sector.

question.spanish: ¿Qué sabe sobre la cultura costarricense?
question.english: What do you know about Costa Rican culture?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Sé que Costa Rica es famosa por su expresión 'Pura Vida' que refleja el optimismo de los ticos. También conozco sobre su compromiso con la paz, la abolición del ejército en 1949, y su liderazgo en conservación ambiental.
sampleAnswer.english: I know that Costa Rica is famous for its expression 'Pura Vida' which reflects the optimism of ticos. I also know about its commitment to peace, the abolition of the army in 1949, and its leadership in environmental conservation.

question.spanish: ¿Tiene experiencia en su campo profesional?
question.english: Do you have experience in your professional field?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Sí, tengo siete años de experiencia en desarrollo de software y turismo digital. He trabajado en proyectos de turismo sostenible y tengo certificaciones en gestión ambiental. Me gustaría contribuir al sector tecnológico de Costa Rica.
sampleAnswer.english: Yes, I have seven years of experience in software development and digital tourism. I have worked on sustainable tourism projects and have certifications in environmental management. I would like to contribute to Costa Rica's technology sector.

question.spanish: ¿Dónde planea vivir en Costa Rica?
question.english: Where do you plan to live in Costa Rica?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Planeo vivir en el Valle Central, posiblemente en San José o Heredia. Me gusta que está cerca de las montañas y las playas, tiene buen clima y hay muchas oportunidades laborales en tecnología.
sampleAnswer.english: I plan to live in the Central Valley, possibly in San José or Heredia. I like that it's close to the mountains and beaches, has good weather and there are many job opportunities in technology.

question.spanish: ¿Cómo piensa integrarse a la sociedad costarricense?
question.english: How do you plan to integrate into Costa Rican society?

sampleAnswer.spanish: Planeo aprender sobre la cultura tica, participar en actividades comunitarias y ambientales, y mejorar mi español con el acento costarricense. También quiero conocer los parques nacionales y contribuir a la conservación.
sampleAnswer.english: I plan to learn about tico culture, participate in community and environmental activities, and improve my Spanish with the Costa Rican accent. I also want to visit the national parks and contribute to conservation.

title.spanish: Costa Rica Lanza Nuevo Programa de Residencia para Profesionales Remotos
title.english: Costa Rica Launches New Residency Program for Remote Professionals

content.spanish: El gobierno de Costa Rica anunció un nuevo programa de visa para nómadas digitales y trabajadores remotos.
content.english: The government of Costa Rica announced a new visa program for digital nomads and remote workers.

content.spanish: La iniciativa busca atraer profesionales extranjeros que puedan trabajar desde Costa Rica para empresas internacionales.
content.english: The initiative seeks to attract foreign professionals who can work from Costa Rica for international companies.

content.spanish: Los solicitantes deben demostrar ingresos mínimos de $3,000 mensuales para calificar.
content.english: Applicants must demonstrate minimum income of $3,000 per month to qualify.

content.spanish: El programa permite residir en el país hasta por dos años, renovables.
content.english: The program allows residence in the country for up to two years, renewable.

content.spanish: Costa Rica ofrece excelente conectividad a internet, infraestructura moderna y estabilidad política.
content.english: Costa Rica offers excellent internet connectivity, modern infrastructure and political stability.

content.spanish: Los beneficiarios pueden traer a sus familiares dependientes bajo la misma visa.
content.english: Beneficiaries can bring their dependent family members under the same visa.

content.spanish: No se requiere pagar impuestos costarricenses sobre ingresos generados fuera del país.
content.english: There is no requirement to pay Costa Rican taxes on income generated outside the country.

content.spanish: Se espera que el programa atraiga a más de 5,000 profesionales durante el primer año.
content.english: The program is expected to attract more than 5,000 professionals during the first year.

question.spanish: ¿Qué tipo de visa anunció Costa Rica?
question.english: What type of visa did Costa Rica announce?

answer.spanish: Una visa para nómadas digitales y trabajadores remotos.
answer.english: A visa for digital nomads and remote workers.

question.spanish: ¿Cuál es el ingreso mínimo requerido?
question.english: What is the minimum income required?

answer.spanish: Los solicitantes deben demostrar ingresos mínimos de $3,000 mensuales.
answer.english: Applicants must demonstrate minimum income of $3,000 per month.

question.spanish: ¿Por cuánto tiempo permite residir el programa?
question.english: How long does the program allow residence?

answer.spanish: El programa permite residir en el país hasta por dos años, renovables.
answer.english: The program allows residence in the country for up to two years, renewable.
